nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
nodes.name: SafeMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: add

nodes.name: name

nodes.documentation: @return the symbol of the token
nodes.name: symbol

nodes.documentation: @return the total supply of the token

nodes.documentation:
@notice Authorize a third party `_operator` to manage (send) `msg.sender`'s tokens.
 @param _operator The operator that wants to be Authorized
nodes.name: authorizeOperator

nodes.documentation:
@notice Revoke a third party `_operator`'s rights to manage (send) `msg.sender`'s tokens.
 @param _operator The operator that wants to be Revoked
nodes.name: revokeOperator
isOperatorFor
operatorSend
mint
burn
erc20

nodes.documentation:
@notice Disables the ERC20 interface. This function can only be called
  by the owner.
nodes.name: disableERC20

nodes.documentation:
@notice Re enables the ERC20 interface. This function can only be called
  by the owner.
nodes.name: enableERC20

nodes.documentation:
@notice For Backwards compatibility
 @return The decimls of the token. Forced to 18 in ERC777.
nodes.name: decimals
transfer
transferFrom
approve
allowance

nodes.documentation:

 @param _amount The quantity that want's to be checked
nodes.name: requireMultiple

doSend
